system.description: A nonmagical, non-metal Target of 1 or fewer Slots is destroyed. The Slots of the Target can increase by spending Mana, increasing by 1 per Mana spent to do so. Any Target that is reduced to 0 HP or destroyed by this Spell is reduced to ash.
